column3: Looks good to me, ACK after changing back the size and squashing the three commits into one commit.\n
OK. I'll wait a while to see if there are any other suggestions before squashing the 3 commits into one\n
I'd also suggest to use `https://www.openssl.org` over the http link.\n
OK. I've just squashed the commits into one commit and changed the http://www.openssl.org to https://www.openssl.org\n

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/516053c349f8abde09597962f4dd3958a2825177 for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
That's better, but still contains a lot of translation noise IMHO :-/.\n
I wouldn't call it a lot of noise and I think it's a necessary evil. The noise is only just before or just after a hyperlinks and those need no translation. But that's just my opinion.\n
I don't think the size of the window needs to change?\n
I have fixed that. Thanks @laanwj for pointing that out\n

IMHO this text could also be set just in the aboutdialog constructor (in utilitydialog.cpp) and we could then use `ui->label_2->setText("Blabla %1... dadada %2... etc... %3").arg("http://www.foo.bar").arg("http://www.foo2.bar").arg("http://www.foo3.bar")`.\n
